main event: On 6th March 1954, two housewives observed an unidentified flying object that changed shape several times during the sighting.
interesting points: The object changed shapes from cigar to delta wing to round and flat,The sighting lasted approximately 65 seconds,The object was seen under clear weather conditions,There were twenty-six aircraft reported in the local area at the time of the sighting,No physical evidence or radar confirmation of the sighting was obtained.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that changed shape
witness description: Both witnesses are housewives and appeared sincere about their observation.
